channel.title: [PI] How to change npc attack styles (rep++ and cookies)
channel.description: Hey i'm using this tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,537710.0.html on how to add nex. I have added everything and nex works perfectly (thanks a lot!) but now I want it to attack with more than just range and to swap attack styles or use "if(npcs[i].HP <= #### && npcs[i].HP >= ####)" but I want to add ice barrage and blood barrage. How can I add both of these as well as the usual melee attack without everything getting messed up? o.O Thanks if you can help but if you can't don't rage! Ps: I can use teamviewer if that would be easier!

item.title: [PI] How to change npc attack styles (rep++ and cookies)
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

You should take a look at the king black dragon it attacks with more than one style.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How to change npc attack styles (rep++ and cookies)

item.title: [PI] How to change npc attack styles (rep++ and cookies)
item.dc:creator: @iamlies iamlies
item.description:
@iamlies wrote:

Hey i’m using this tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,537710.0.html on how to add nex.
I have added everything and nex works perfectly (thanks a lot!) but now I want it to attack with more than just range and to swap attack styles or use “if(npcs[i].HP <= #### && npcs[i].HP >= ####)” but I want to add ice barrage and blood barrage. How can I add both of these as well as the usual melee attack without everything getting messed up? o.O Thanks if you can help but if you can’t don’t rage!
Ps: I can use teamviewer if that would be easier!
